auth.noAccountYet: No account yet? Create one here!

auth.accountBenefits: An account allows you to customize the site's behavior, with many more features yet to come.
auth.name: Display Name
auth.nameHelp: Only English letters, digits, dashes and underscores. Must be between {{min}} and {{max}} characters. Can be changed later.
auth.emailHelp: Use a valid e-mail address that can receive messages to ensure you do not lose access to your account. This address must be confirmed after signing up. <1>We will not send you spam.</1>
auth.passwordHelp: Must be at least {{min}} characters long and not commonly used.

auth.rateLimited_plural: Too many signin attempts, please try again in {{count}} seconds
